title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 61.3 - When records are to be made
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 61.3 - When records are to be made

State Regulations

When cattle or horses are purchased, the required
information relating to the purchase shall be recorded immediately upon
completion of the purchase. When such animals are consigned or sold, the
required information relating thereto shall be recorded immediately upon
completion of the consignment or sale. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
61.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
